attributes.action: Encourage the tabloids to be more responsible and not when reporting crime, especially crime of a sexual nature on the same or opposite page to a picture of a model/actress/singer designed to be sexually promiscuous.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many tabloid newspapers report crime, even crime of a sexual nature. For example, where a criminal has been convicted of a sexual offense on the same page or opposite pictures of models, actresses and singers designed to appeal to the sexual nature of some of their readers. Meaning the readers are increasingly likely to look on the victims of the crime in a sexualised manner. Which in turn could be seen as degrading to the victims and their families and friends.
